name: Box Inc.
goal: Box provides and Enterprise Cloud Solution for file sharing, content management and collaboration
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Europea Cloud Computing Strategy, The European Cloud Initiative, Digital Single Market, Cloud Select Industry Groups, European Cloud Partnership, European Data Protection Compliance, including GDPR certifications, Eurocloud,  ES Cloud. European Commission: EDPS, Justice, Freedom and Security Directorate General, the Data Protection Officer of the European Commission. European Data Protection Committee (Art. 29 WP) and local Data Protection Authorities. Commission expert group on the Regulation (EU) 2016/679 and Directive (EU) 2016/680 (E03461); Digital Agenda for Europe; European Cloud Initiative.
